about_paragraph_1: Fluid Systems Engineering S.A.C. was founded on May 12, 1985. ISF SAC provides systems, equipment, and spare parts for industrial refrigeration, hydraulic oil systems, and industrial automation for sectors such as fishing, food industry, beverages, cement plants, mining, and oil.
about_paragraph_2: Our service includes engineering solutions, equipment maintenance, as well as supply, installation, and commissioning of turnkey projects. Our after-sales service is available 24/7, 365 days a year, ensuring an immediate response to any problem our clients may have.
about_paragraph_3: With over 40 years of experience, ISF SAC has established itself in Peru as a reliable company with cutting-edge technology, especially in the fishing and industrial sectors, and has expanded to countries like Ecuador and Panama.
team_subtitle: The dedicated team of Fluid Systems Engineering S.A.C.
